title: Ice Cream Friday: Vegan Dulce de Leche
directions: Put the coconut milk and ½ cup dulche de leche into a blender.
Taste and add more dulce de leche to taste (I added an extra 2 tbsp).
Freeze according to your ice cream maker's instructions, or pour the mixture into a container and freeze.
ingredients: ½ - ¾ cup coconut milk dulche de leche (an awesome recipe by Jasmine over at The Blenderist)
